# iddoverse

The `iddoverse` contains R functions to convert IDDO-curated SDTM
domains into analysis ready datasets (‘analysis datasets’). These
reusable functions aim to provide a toolbox for researchers to modify
the analysis dataset to their study-specific needs, speeding up the time
it takes to create analysable data.

This package takes inspiration from the `pharmaverse`, specifically the
[`admiral`](https://github.com/pharmaverse/admiral) R package, however,
IDDO-SDTM formats are not strictly compliant with standards required by
pharmacutical companies and the target audience of the `iddoverse` are
researchers who do not have a working knowledge of SDTM, unlike the
`pharmaverse`.

``` R
IDDO - Infectious Disease Data Observatory
SDTM - Study Data Tabulation Model, an internation data storage model from CDISC which is used by IDDO.
```

## Installation

You can install the development version of `iddoverse` from
[GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools") #if you have not previously installed 'devtools' on your machine
devtools::install_github("Infectious-Diseases-Data-Observatory/iddoverse")
library(iddoverse)
```

We recommend updating the install regularly as the package is developing
constantly. Versions starting with ‘0.’ should be expected to change
without notification.

It is best to remove the package and reinstall the current version:

``` r
detach("package:iddoverse", unload = TRUE)

devtools::install_github("Infectious-Diseases-Data-Observatory/iddoverse")
library(iddoverse)
```

## Why is this useful?

The package will assist researchers manpiulate their datasets
transferred from IDDO, minimising the time spent on data transformation
before analysis can begin.

## Citation

To cite `iddoverse` in publications, see
[CITATION](https://github.com/Infectious-Diseases-Data-Observatory/iddoverse/blob/main/inst/CITATION)

## Issues

Improvements to the code are constantly being made, if you notice
errors, bugs, want to suggest improvements or have ideas for better
functionality, please describe them in
[Issues](https://github.com/Infectious-Diseases-Data-Observatory/iddoverse/issues).

## Contact

Please contact Rhys Peploe (<rhys.peploe@iddo.org> or
<rhyspeploe1998@gmail.com>) if you would like to know more, need support
or are interested in contributing to the package.

# Package index

## All functions

- [`DM_RPTESTB`](https://infectious-diseases-data-observatory.github.io/worlddatr/reference/DM_RPTESTB.md)
  : IDDO-SDTM Tutorial Demographics (DM) Domain
- [`DS_RPTESTB`](https://infectious-diseases-data-observatory.github.io/worlddatr/reference/DS_RPTESTB.md)
  : IDDO-SDTM Tutorial Disposition (DS) Domain
- [`HO_RPTESTB`](https://infectious-diseases-data-observatory.github.io/worlddatr/reference/HO_RPTESTB.md)
  : IDDO-SDTM Tutorial Healthcare Encounters (HO) Domain
- [`IN_RPTESTB`](https://infectious-diseases-data-observatory.github.io/worlddatr/reference/IN_RPTESTB.md)
  : IDDO-SDTM Tutorial Treatments and Interventions (IN) Domain
- [`LB_RPTESTB`](https://infectious-diseases-data-observatory.github.io/worlddatr/reference/LB_RPTESTB.md)
  : IDDO-SDTM Tutorial Laboratory Test Results (LB) Domain
- [`MB_RPTESTB`](https://infectious-diseases-data-observatory.github.io/worlddatr/reference/MB_RPTESTB.md)
  : IDDO-SDTM Tutorial Microbiology (MB) Domain
- [`PE_RPTESTB`](https://infectious-diseases-data-observatory.github.io/worlddatr/reference/PE_RPTESTB.md)
  : IDDO-SDTM Tutorial Physical Examination (PE) Domain
- [`PF_RPTESTB`](https://infectious-diseases-data-observatory.github.io/worlddatr/reference/PF_RPTESTB.md)
  : IDDO-SDTM Tutorial Pharmacogenomics Genetics (PF) Domain
- [`RP_RPTESTB`](https://infectious-diseases-data-observatory.github.io/worlddatr/reference/RP_RPTESTB.md)
  : IDDO-SDTM Tutorial Reproductive System Findings (RP) Domain
- [`RS_RPTESTB`](https://infectious-diseases-data-observatory.github.io/worlddatr/reference/RS_RPTESTB.md)
  : IDDO-SDTM Tutorial Disease Response and Clinical Classification (RS)
  Domain
- [`SA_RPTESTB`](https://infectious-diseases-data-observatory.github.io/worlddatr/reference/SA_RPTESTB.md)
  : IDDO-SDTM Tutorial Clinical and Adverse Events (SA) Domain
- [`TI_RPTESTB`](https://infectious-diseases-data-observatory.github.io/worlddatr/reference/TI_RPTESTB.md)
  : IDDO-SDTM Tutorial Trial Inclusion Exclusion Criteria (TI) Domain
- [`TS_RPTESTB`](https://infectious-diseases-data-observatory.github.io/worlddatr/reference/TS_RPTESTB.md)
  : IDDO-SDTM Tutorial Trial Summary (TS) Domain
- [`TV_RPTESTB`](https://infectious-diseases-data-observatory.github.io/worlddatr/reference/TV_RPTESTB.md)
  : IDDO-SDTM Tutorial Trial Visits (TV) Domain
- [`VS_RPTESTB`](https://infectious-diseases-data-observatory.github.io/worlddatr/reference/VS_RPTESTB.md)
  : IDDO-SDTM Tutorial Vital Signs (VS) Domain
- [`check_data()`](https://infectious-diseases-data-observatory.github.io/worlddatr/reference/check_data.md)
  : Perform data checks on IDDO-SDTM data
- [`convert_age_to_years()`](https://infectious-diseases-data-observatory.github.io/worlddatr/reference/convert_age_to_years.md)
  : Convert AGE to years.
- [`create_clinical_hist_table()`](https://infectious-diseases-data-observatory.github.io/worlddatr/reference/create_clinical_hist_table.md)
  : Creates table of medical history features
- [`create_clinical_table()`](https://infectious-diseases-data-observatory.github.io/worlddatr/reference/create_clinical_table.md)
  : Creates table of key clinical features
- [`create_labs_table()`](https://infectious-diseases-data-observatory.github.io/worlddatr/reference/create_labs_table.md)
  : Create table of laboratory test results
- [`create_malaria_parasitemia_table()`](https://infectious-diseases-data-observatory.github.io/worlddatr/reference/create_malaria_parasitemia_table.md)
  : Create table of parasitemia data specifically for malaria parasites.
- [`create_malaria_pcr_table()`](https://infectious-diseases-data-observatory.github.io/worlddatr/reference/create_malaria_pcr_table.md)
  : Create table of malaria specific PCR data
- [`create_participant_table()`](https://infectious-diseases-data-observatory.github.io/worlddatr/reference/create_participant_table.md)
  : Create table of participant details and baseline characteristics.
- [`derive_anthro_scores()`](https://infectious-diseases-data-observatory.github.io/worlddatr/reference/derive_anthro_scores.md)
  : Calculate WHO growth standards using the anthro() package.
- [`prepare_domain()`](https://infectious-diseases-data-observatory.github.io/worlddatr/reference/prepare_domain.md)
  : Prepare IDDO-SDTM domain for analysis
- [`table_variables()`](https://infectious-diseases-data-observatory.github.io/worlddatr/reference/table_variables.md)
  : Tabulate function to display variables in a given domain
